moves.1. e4 c6 2. d4 d5 3. f3: not a good move. it opens the king side too soon.
moves.3... g6: maybe e6 was better. my fear is that white will play e5 and than the bishop is useless on g7.
moves.4. exd5 cxd5 5. Bb5+ Bd7: Nc6 is better. keep the strong bishop.
moves.7... f6: wants e5. why not Bg7 with the same idea?
moves.8. O-O e5 9. Re1 Nc6: black king is still in the center and its a bit dangerous.
moves.11. Nd2 Nh6 12. f4:
???
allowing black to lock the center with e4 and to attack strongly on the king side.
????????
very bad move. it opens the h file for black.
